name: Burgers of Time
description:
Background

In a bleak and barren realm, you're a nameless hero with a critical quest. You're whisked to a parallel world where time is rare and valuable. This world teeters on the edge of collapse, and you soon learn that crafting burgers is the key to salvation.

Armed with a ramshackle floatin' plate and a mere 10 seconds per burger, the pressure's on. 

How to Play

It's quite simple, literally just drag and drop the ingredients on the plate.
